title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 471.4 - Motor vehicles transporting mail
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 471.4 - Motor vehicles transporting mail

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 504, subd. 1
A motor vehicle engaged exclusively in transporting

United States mail under contract is exempt and therefore is not required to
have a permit. However, if such a motor vehicle is used for any other purpose, a permit and plate must be obtained for the vehicle and its entire mileage for
the current month, including mileage for both exempt and nonexempt purposes, is
taxable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
471.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
